tossup_question: -   –  What term can apply to the compounds 1-octanol and sodium dodecyl-sulfate [doh-dek-ihl sulfate], as well as transmembrane proteins, phospholipids, and surfactants, characterizing molecules that contain both fat-soluble and water-soluble components?
bonus_question: -   –  A gas phase reaction is conducted in a cylinder with a moveable piston. If the reaction releases 320 joules of heat and does 150 joules of PV work, what is the change in internal energy, in joules, for this reaction?
